testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: Then I see that the show launch page checkbox is set to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: When I set the proctor sign-in checkbox to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I set the show launch page checkbox to false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: Then I see an alert message stating that the launch page must be displayed with proctor sign-in
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: And I see that the show launch page checkbox is set to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy cannot be unchecked when the Proctor Authorization is required

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Set a password and disable visibility simultaneously. ?[90m# assignment/AssignmentPolicies.feature:9?[0m # Added to check bugfix in TA-8861. # Create an assignment, set some policies. ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid information for the assignment "?[0m?[32m?[1mPassword with Invisibility?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.enterAssignmentNameAndDescription(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click on the set policies tab?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.clickSetPoliciesTab()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI set the password authorization checkbox to ?[0m?[32m?[1mtrue?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.setPasswordAuthorizationCheckbox(boolean)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI set the assignment password to be "?[0m?[32m?[1msomething?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.setAssignmentPassword(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI set the assignment visibility checkbox to ?[0m?[32m?[1mfalse?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.setVisibleCheckbox(boolean)?[0m # Save the new assignment. ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI save & close the assignment on the policies page?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.saveAndCloseAssignment()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see summary of the assignment?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.assertAssignmentSummaryShown()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI save it anyway?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.saveAssignmentAnyway()?[0m # Open assignment again, check that the policies were persisted. ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe new assignment "?[0m?[32m?[1mPassword with Invisibility?[0m?[32m" is visible in its own expanded column?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.assertNamedAssignmentColumnIsExpanded(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI edit the "?[0m?[32m?[1mPassword with Invisibility?[0m?[32m" assignment?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.editModule(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click on the set policies tab?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.clickSetPoliciesTab()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mThe assignment password is "?[0m?[32m?[1msomething?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.asertAssignmentPassword(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mThe assignment visibility checkbox is ?[0m?[32m?[1mfalse?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorPropertiesSteps.assertVisibleCheckboxState(boolean)?[0m
